meanings.definition: The quality or state of being unfaithful.
meanings.sent1: Her unfaithfulness to her best friend hurt their relationship.
meanings.sent2: The unfaithfulness of the employee led to his dismissal from the company.
meanings.sent3: The unfaithfulness of the cat to its owner was evident when it ran away for days.
meanings.sent4: The unfaithfulness of the old bridge was revealed when it collapsed under the weight of the truck.
meanings.sent5: The unfaithfulness of the weather forecast made planning the picnic impossible.

meanings.sent1: The soldier's unfaithfulness to his country was a betrayal of trust.
meanings.sent2: The unfaithfulness of the student towards his teacher was disappointing.
meanings.sent3: The unfaithfulness of the dog to its favorite toy was amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: The unfaithfulness of the old tree to its roots symbolized a break in tradition.
meanings.sent5: The unfaithfulness of the compass made navigation through the forest challenging.

meanings.sent1: The unfaithfulness of the husband caused turmoil in the family.
meanings.sent2: The politician's unfaithfulness to his promises cost him the election.
meanings.sent3: The unfaithfulness of the phone battery to hold charge was frustrating.
meanings.sent4: The unfaithfulness of the map led the hikers astray in the wilderness.
meanings.sent5: The unfaithfulness of the clock's ticking made time seem to drag on endlessly.
